title: 180: Herodotus II: Cyrus the Virus
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this second episode on the Landmark Herodotus, we discuss the exploits of Cyrus the great. You can look forward to: baby swapping, kid kingdom, and blood wine for the dead!
itunes:author: Poor poor conquered generals
itunes:subtitle: Blood wine? Yes, please!
